ApplyCertificate.document: This example shows you how to apply for a free certificate.
ApplyCertificate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyCertificate
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DvAuthMethod": "DNS_AUTO",
    "DomainName": "wgc.red"
}
ApplyCertificate.title: Applying for a free certificate

    ]
}

CreateCSR.document: This example show you how to create a CSR.
CreateCSR.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCSR
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Domain": "abc12",
    "Organization": "abc12",
    "Department": "abc12",
    "Email": "abc@qq.com",
    "Province": "abc",
    "City": "abc",
    "Country": "abc",
    "EncryptAlgo": "ECC",
    "KeyParameter": "prime256v1",
    "Generate": false
}
CreateCSR.title: Creating a CSR

Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeHostTeoInstanceList
<Common request parameters>

{
    "CertificateId": "abc",
    "IsCache": 1,
    "Filters": [
        {
            "FilterKey": "abc",
            "FilterValue": "abc"
        }
    ],
    "ResourceType": "abc",
    "OldCertificateId": "abc"
}
DescribeHostTeoInstanceList.title: u200cQuerying the list of EDGEONE instances

ModifyCSR.document: This example shows you how to modify a CSR.
ModifyCSR.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyCSR
<Common request parameters>

{
    "CSRId": 662,
    "Generate": false,
    "Domain": "abc123.com",
    "Organization": "abc123",
    "Department": "abc123",
    "Email": "abc@qq.com",
    "Province": "abc12",
    "City": "abc",
    "Country": "abc123",
    "EncryptAlgo": "RSA",
    "KeyParameter": "2048"
}
ModifyCSR.title: Modifying a CSR
